name: ZegnaRun 0.5
description:
ZegnaRun features fast pace, Infinite Runner style game play, with a unique level system that uses a single number to manage all aspects of your characters. Run, jump, and shoot your way to victory, as you fight dangerous foes!

Worlds collide as a traditional village along the coast seeks to end the tyranny of a modern organization, known as The Next World. Players will guide Akosua, a young thief following orders from The Next World, as he discovers the true intentions behind his leader's actions.

This Version of ZegnaRun serves as an extensive prologue to the events of ZegnaRun Ver. 1.0.
